Question: This person was subsequently in a high-profile on-and-off relationship with Amber Rose from 2008 until the summer of 2010.
Hints: In November 2010, in a taped interview with Matt Lauer for the Today Show, this person expressed regret for his criticism of Bush.
This person has additionally designed shoewear for Bape and Italian shoemaker Giuseppe Zanotti.
In January 2009, this person introduced his first shoe line designed for Louis Vuitton during Paris Fashion Week.
